title: AKDMKS : Akademiks clothing : 001 : "Indian Script"
content:
Akademiks is an NYC-based clothing company, established in 1999. I am posting a series of fonts used by Akademiks. Please help me ID the fonts.

"Indian Script"

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110508004817im_/http:/typophile.com/files/AkademiksIndianScript_4671.jpg)

This one might be custom, so don't bang your head too hard.
author: dirtcastle

comments.content:
I'd say it is custom.

- Mike Yanega
